content.text:
Let me analyze the main target image and provide assembly instructions using the blocks from the dictionary.

Analysis of Main Target Image:
The image shows two separate structures:

1. Left Structure:
- 3 blocks total
- 2 layers
- Yellow cylindrical base
- Green vertical block
- Orange horizontal cylinder on top

2. Right Structure:
- 6 blocks total
- 2 layers
- Bottom layer: 2 red arch blocks forming a bridge
- Top layer: 2 tall yellow blocks and 2 green blocks of different heights

Block Selection and Assembly Instructions:

For Left Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 13 (yellow cylinder base)
    Step2: Move block with index 5 (green vertical block)
    Step3: Move block with index 11 (orange horizontal cylinder)
}

For Right Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (red arch block - left)
    Step2: Move block with index 2 (red arch block - right)
    Step3: Move block with index 7 (tall yellow block - left)
    Step4: Move block with index 7 (tall yellow block - right)
    Step5: Move block with index 5 (green vertical block - left)
    Step6: Move block with index 5 (green vertical block - right)
}

Total blocks used: 9 blocks (with some block types used multiple times)
